resources.string: 检测到新版本,点击确定跳转至googlePlay更新
The new version provides a better experience and richer functionality,please update.

请求服务失败，请稍后重试
验证码错误，请重新输入
请求服务失败，重新加载？
上传图片失败，请重新上传
请手动打开应用需要的权限
两次输入不一样，请重新输入
密码格式不对，需数字和字母组合，请重新输入
请输入正确格式的手机号码!
点击提交申请即同意《个人贷款合同》
Please check the box to continue your application.
超过%s的金额只适用于优质客户
超过%s的日期只适用于优质客户
您的借款申请正在审核中,预计1–2个工作日内工作人员会联系您,请保持手机畅通!
*您的借款申请已通过审核,正在放款,预计1–2个工作日会到账;
*若未收到款请先与您银行卡所在银行进行核对,其他问题请联系客服:9996662211;
本次申请没有通过,建议%s天后再次申请!
请重新上传身份证照片,或者修改其他个人信息!
提前还款有助于您提高您下次借款的额度和期限!
经审核，您上传的身份证照片不符合要求，请重新上传清晰、有效的证件照片。上传成功后，我们将及时对您的身份信息进行审核，谢谢！
请先选择银行和开卡城市
手机号码错误,返回首页修改
银行名称(必须填写户名是本人的银行账号)
请输入正确的银行卡号
密码格式为6–16位，需要同时包含字母和数字
如未收到验证码,请检查您的手机号码是否有误!
Choose offline cash pickup,handling fee will be deducted from your disbursement amount!
China Bank Saving is not supported, pls select another bank or offline cash pickup.
您好！Upeso需要安全地处理您的数据，以帮助您获得贷款资格。 请允许每个权限以便继续您的贷款申请。
Upeso需要访问您的联系人和短信。我们的系统会通过处理这些信息，来了解您的财务历史记录并建立您的网络。未经您的许可，我们绝不会致电或发送短信给您的联系人。
下次发薪日期是必填字段
亲属手机号是必填字段
公司电话输入错误，请输入有效的电话号码
Upeso视用户信息安全与隐私保护为自己的"生命线",我们会严格遵守用户隐私政策,确保用户信息安全
Take a selfie while holding your ID
必须提供手持身份证照片，否则会拒绝申请
1.将你的身份证放在胸前，不要遮住脸；
Make sure handheld ID image is provided,otherwise application will be rejected:
1.Put ID in front of you, don\'t cover your face;
1.Make sure ID image is clear and complete;
2.Make sure your face in handheld image is clear and complete.
Must provide above mentioned images, otherwise application will be rejected.
Please make sure your image is provided, otherwise the application will be rejected.
1. Please make sure it is done by yourself, and it will be compared with your picture on your ID, meanwhile, you only have two times for this verification
2. Please make sure during the recognition, your face is complete and clear with the capture area.
Click for live face identification, please move your face like the sample demostrated, this process will be compared with ID, so ensure your image is clear and movement is smooth.
如果你是老用户,请直接登录
请及时还款！如不及时还款，将支付高额罚金！
已将合同PDF下载至手机Download文件夹!
您使用哪种传递消息的应用程序？

社交软件注册的手机号
请输入社交软件注册的手机号
身份证号码必须是9位或12位数
Driver\'s License Number 11 digits start with English letter
SSS card Number is pure 10 digits only
UMID Number is pure 12 digits only
您的年龄不符合申请条件
您的身份证号与性别不符
请输入有效的邮箱地址
该输入框应输入其他社交软件名称
社交软件注册手机号是必填字段
社交软件注册号码输入错误，请输入有效的电话号码
Click submit to agree to the
手机号码错误，请输入10位手机号码
You can settle the loan in any branches of the following DragonPay Payment Partners:
SM Department Store and Supermarket, SM Payment Counters and Savemore
Bills Payment > MORE BILLERS > Loans > DRAGON LOANS > Enter the following required details.
Go to cashier with slip for payment and keep your receipt.
Paying via Bayad Center, LBC, Cebuana Lhuillier,SM Payment Counters or Robinson’s Payment Center.
Get a payment form and write DRAGONPAY as Receiver/Biller Name.
Fill up the form provided from payment centers including reference No.(Lifetime ID) and Amount.
Go to cashier for payment and keep your receipt.
Settle your Account on or before 7pm of your DUE DATE,After repayment,Your repayment record will be upgraded within 1–2 working days.
没钱了？找到您的互联网手机钱包Upeso，让您的贷款无忧无虑。Upeso是一款快捷方便的手机贷款工具，只需提供身份证，下载和安装App，即可体验“留在家中，即时申请高效审批，可重复使用”的互联网金融技术贷款服务; 满足年轻人“随时随地，想购买”的消费需求，提高生活质量.
如果您想与我们合作或在使用怀疑的过程中，请联系我们的客户服务。\n客户服务电子邮件：cs@upeso.ph
如果您想加入我们，请发送简历，我们会尽快与您联系。\n招聘电子邮件：hr@upeso.ph
获取和支付贷款的简单步骤
借款期限结束时通过支付合作伙伴还款
Legal Full name (as seen on your ID)
Legal Middle Name (optional,if listed on ID)
Legal Last Name (as seen on your ID)
每邀请一位有效用户，成功贷款后邀请人即可获得100₫现金红包,(有效用户指：从未注册过的实名认证的真实用户)
评估您是优质客户，可以选择更高额度
With bank account information submitted, bigger chance for approved loan!
验证失败，注册手机号与验证手机号码不一致，请再次验证!
Access your device information permission for mobile network information and help us prevent fraud.
These permissions serve to securely save and protect your information. This information stays safely in our databases, and is never resold.
We use your location, device and usage data for research purposes and to help us prevent fraud

Please allow Upeso to store your Phone number and app list on our servers for prevent fraud and verify your identity purpose. The security of your private information will be strictly protected and will not be disclosed to any third party
Please accept our permissions to help us protect your information safely and securely. We will not sell your information.

Upeso would like to access your phone book and contact data to replace your input and speed up your application. The data will be encrypted and upload on our server. We will strictly keep your data confidential, and only use them to help us prevent fraud and determine your eligibility for credit . We only contact your chosen contact person to confirm your information when necessary.
If you choose not to use this feature, you can disable our perimissions in your settings application. Please note this may result in us being unable to process your application.
Access devices used to take pictures and record videos.
If you choose not to use this feature, you can disable our perimissions in your settings application. Please note this may result in us being unable to process your application.

The information we collect will be uploaded to the server and used for loan review,please provide real information.By granting permissions you acknowledge that you have read and agreed on Privacy Policy & Terms of Services
好消息，针对贷款两次以及以上用户，贷款最高10%的折扣；
申请贷款！即刻为你带来5%-10%的折扣！
再次申请贷款，继续享受5%-10%的优惠折扣！
结清后再贷，立即可享受5%-10%的支付折扣，快来体验啊！
Please login again now. Your security token has expired
*Upon reviewing, the fees for the 2nd term is deducted since you have good credit standing. More discount for you if you repay on time.
Please input correct 12-digit TIN number, ended with 000.
• Keeping the app installed will help you qualify for larger loan amounts more quickly.\n• Pay your loan on time to see your limit increase.\n• Not paying on time may reduce your future loan offers.
Congratulations, your loyalty is rewarded. You reached the silver level. Keep on partnering with us to reach a higher level
Congratulations, your loyalty is rewarded. You reached the gold level. Keep on partnering with us to reach a higher level
Congratulations, your loyalty is rewarded. You reached the diamond level. Keep on partnering with us to reach a higher level
Please select the most convenient time to call you from the options below. Be mindful of your phone during this time so you can take the call. Thank you.
Please select your convenient time period
Please login in if you are regular user already
Note: Your information will be under strict protection, you might not be able to get the loan if you can‘t provide the authentic information.

Dear clients, in view of the COVID-19 situation, and in compliance with the government directives on Enhanced Community Quarantine, we will stop processing loan applications and suggest you re-apply after this outbreak of CPVID-19. Thanks for your understanding and wish you and your family stay safe and healthy.
Unabled to link with Facebook. Please try again.

Repaying with Upeso has never been this easy! Choose among thousands of our partners such as 7Eleven, MLhuillier, True Money ,G-Cash, PayMaya and more! You may settle your loan with the following payment partners:

- Simple payment method! 
 
 - Click get barcode button in our APP. Then, enter the amount you want to pay. 
 
 - Go to the nearest 7/11 outlet.
 
 - Go to checkout counter and show cashier the barcode to process the payment.
 
 - Pay the amount and keep the official receipt for reference.

- Please have your Reference NO. And the amount to be settle ready. 
 
 - Go to the nearest 7/11 outlet.
 
- In the kiosk Machine, click the "Bills Payment" 
 
 - Type Biller name:"SKYPAY" or "FASTPAY"; 
 
 - Type in the needed details: *Contract Number (Reference NO.) *Mobile Number/Contact Number (Phone no. registered at Upeso) *Amount
 
 - Present the printed out payment details into the counter.
 
 - Pay the amount and keep the official receipt for reference.

- Open your CLIQQ app and check your balance. 
 
 - Select "Loans”. Under "Loans", click "SKYPAY" or "FASTPAY".

 - You'll need to provide this details: *Contract Number ( Reference NO. ) *Mobile Number/Contact Number (Phone no. registered at Upeso) *Amount 
 
 - Click "Confirm"

- Please have your Reference NO. and the amount to be settled ready. 
 
 - Go to the nearest M Lhuillier stores.
 
 - Get a payment form and provide the needed details: *Compant name ：SKYPAY-API *Account Name (Your name) *Account number (Reference NO. ) *Call / Mobile No (Phone no. registered at Upeso) *Amount PHP
 
 - Present it to the counter. 
 
 - Pay the amount and keep the official receipt for reference.

- Please have your Reference NO. and the amount to be settled ready. 
 
 - Go to the nearest RD PAWNSHOP stores.
 
 - Get a payment form and provide the needed details: *Biller / Compant name ：SKYPAY-API *Customer Account NO. (Reference NO. ) *Amount PHP *Date *Customer Name & Mobile No (Name & Phone no. registered at Upeso)
 
- Present it to the counter. 
 
 - Pay the amount and keep the official receipt for reference.

- Open your GCash app and check your balance and make it enough for payment.
 
 - Select "Pay Bills">"Loans">"SKYPAY".
 
 - You'll need to provide this details: *Contract Number ( Reference NO. ) *Mobile Number (Phone no. registered at Upeso) *Amount *Email
 
- Submit the payment 
 
 - Check your SMS to confirm payment is successful

- Open your PayMaya app and check your balance and make it enough for payment.
 
 - Select "Bills">"Loans">"SKYPAY".
 
 - You'll need to provide this details: *Contract Number / Account Number ( Reference NO. ) *Amount *Mobile Number (Phone no. registered at Upeso)
 
 - Submit the payment - Check your balance or "View all" Recent Activities in the app to confirm payment is successful

- Please have your Reference NO. And the amount to be settled ready. 
 
 - Go to the nearest true money center and tell cashier you will pay bills.
 
 - Tell cashier choose "Mag-Billspay">"Loans">"SKYPAY" on the transaction machine 
 
- Provide the needed details to cashier for type-in and check if all correct: *Contract Number ( Reference NO. ) *Custr's Mobile no. (Phone no. registered at Upeso) *Amount
 
 - Get the printed out official receipt.
 
 - Pay the amount and keep the official receipt for reference.
